response.message: Who had the unfortunate task of being inside the suit?

Every time I hear the name, I am going to think of the Little Britain character!

https://i.stack.imgur.com/x8paP.jpg

Bubbles!
The name bubbles just makes me think of a joke I heard once.

I..uhh...what.... that's kinda awesome.

Also Adventure time!  Also Quailman.
I just feel sorry for the man inside the suit.
Surely I'm not the only one that thought of [Bubble Bobble](http://t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQt41FnMuokvX73HIMoyD3mrsMYweJpLKkwwZKHp4XWHXH-vjkZNiJ7CmiW) when reading the title.

I think it's safe to say that it is neither Sam, Abby, Laura, nor Lauren.  The absence of Brett and Aarthi from those pictures are rather suspicious.  Or I wonder if Bubbles makes up the two new members of CHAOS?  (http://meta.stackoverflow.com/questions/100137/what-is-the-meaning-of-chaos-is-it-related-to-the-psi-character/100359#comment282218_100359)

Aww, that picture with Gumby... BFFs.
You guys were there!?! You should've said so ahead of time! I totally missed you among all the excitement.
A mascot with no SO branding or name on it. And the only visible web site in the images being "Walt Disney" on the cartoon hand gloves. Is this some brilliant underground viral marketing thing?
Lame. Clippy should of been our Mascot.

Shame there are no dev days maybe bubbles will do an international tour at some other point. 

Though not sure how bubbles would fit through the body scanners.
@Surfasb - no need, you just enable aero/compviz and set transparency
ps - has SO turned up the security? The first three capchas I go for that comment had an equation, Hindi (?) and Hebrew words to enter!
Reminds me of the first joke here: Three ducks arrive
Bubbles looks like he belongs in the color swatch aisle of a paint store.
I asked the mascot if it was any relation to Bubbles from Trailer Park Boys, but it closed my question as off-topic.
That looks cute bubbles.  It reminds me the character form Trailer Park Boys TV series.
